I have also studied a bit of design at Loyola, and feel as though this helps whenever I am working on the UI of a page. ‚ú®

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: A website that is being built for a ficitonsal international business that sells salmon shaped cookies that contain salmon in them.  This was done using vanilla javascript, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: The company Odd Duck Products, contracted me to deliver an app which would allow their customers to vote on their favorite products based upon random sets of three.  They did not want duplicates or the item items showing up back to back in order to mitigate bias in the app.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
